item.title: More investors want public and private assets in their portfolio. Now there's a benchmark to track this combo
item.description: Morningstar announced the Modern Market 100, the first framework to combine public and private equity exposure in one index.

item.title: Klarna prices IPO at $40, above online lender's expected range
item.description: Klarna priced its IPO at $40 a share, an offering that values the company at about $15 billion.

item.title: Uber partners with fintech firm Pipe to offer capital to small businesses
item.description: Uber is partnering with fintech firm Pipe to incorporate embedded technology in the Uber Eats Manager for small businesses to access capital.

item.title: Wells Fargo CEO sees 'more downside' to U.S. economy as lower-income consumers struggle
item.description: Wells Fargo CEO Charles Scharf commented on the state of the economy the day after JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said jobs data shows the economy is ...

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Oracle, GameStop, Novo Nordisk, Synopsys and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.
